simpledc.title: Philosophy at Cambridge, Newsletter of the Faculty of Philosophy
Philosophy at Cambridge
simpledc.creator: Lecky-Thompson, Jenni
simpledc.subject: philosophy
simpledc.description: Newsletter of the Philosophy Faculty. Articles by: Simon Blackburn, 'From the Chair' ; Nick Treanor, 'Inaugural lecture: What is distinctive about human thought?' ; Clare Chambers, 'Political Philosophy at Cambridge' ; Alexis Papazoglou,'Aspects of philosophy at Cambridge' ; Peter Smith, 'Principia at 100' ; Nigel Crisp, 'Turning the World Upside Down' ; Cain Todd, 'Fiction, Emotion, Imagination'; Fraser MacBride, 'Philosophy, St John's, Cambridge, 1986.'
simpledc.publisher: Faculty of Philosophy, University of Cambridge
